verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In Him we live, and move, and have our being.
In Him we live. (3x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In Him we're beautiful, lovely, marvelous, wonderful,
Because in Him we live.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In him we're fore-ordained, called of God, justified, and glorified,
Because in Him we live.
